description:
CENTRAL COWES LIFESTYLE PROPERTY WITH A POOL
A great opportunity to secure this well maintained brick home in the Cowes central where you can walk to everything including the north facing beach of Cowes. This property has successfully operative as a very lucrative holiday rental over the last six years and is five star reviewed. Take advantage of growing tourist numbers to Phillip Island and live the lifestyle you have always dreamed of. This property is located on a corner allotment of approx. 800m2, in a quiet yet high exposure position in central Cowes close to both the beach, supermarkets, shops & restaurants and only a short drive to the world renowned Penguin Parade & Phillip Island Grand Prix Circuit.
Offering three bedrooms that can comfortably accommodate seven guests and bathroom with separate shower & bath. The large and comfortable lounge has reverse cycle heating/cooling and separate dining plus kitchen with dishwasher and polished floorboards throughout.
Outdoor features include an 8m x 4m in ground swimming pool, entertaining area, established garden complete with fruit trees, high fencing for privacy, lock up garage plus small storage shed, as well as off street parking.
This wonderful property offers endless possibilities; perfect for the savvy investor, ongoing holiday rental, for your family holiday home or permanently living. Inspection by appointment only.
Asking $539,000

New land release Seagrove Estate. Be quick! Selling fast.
Live closer to everything. The soon to be commenced Bronzewing release is only a short walk to the centre of town. The Seagrove estate is just 800 metres from the main street of Cowes, and even closer to the beach.
An exclusive area, overlooking landscaped open space featuring tall, mature eucalypts. The Bronzewing release features an underground gas (LPG) network, recycled water, and super fast optic fibre connections to the National Broadband Network.
Titles are expected early to mid 2018.
Call our sales team now to secure your slice of Phillip Island.

Stylish outdoor entertainer
This 4 bedroom home is situated on a 733m2 approx corner allotment in the popular Seagrove Estate. Close to schools, cafe's and the shopping precinct - the modern residence offers the perfect position for family living.
As you enter this spacious rendered brick home you are greeted by polished floorboards, high ceilings, square set cornice and quality fittings throughout. A generous master suite offering walk in robe and full ensuite with double basins, frameless glass shower and floor to ceiling tiles giving it a luxurious feel. With 3 additional bedrooms all with built in robes,and a study alcove there is plenty of room for the whole family. The two large open plan living areas look out onto the expansive decked entertainment area and under cover alfresco, complete with spa bath and landscaped gardens.
The kitchen has also been designed with entertaining in mind with a large central island bench, stone benchtops, Smeg stainless steel stove and cooktop, dishwasher and walk in pantry. The family bathroom is centrally located and complemented by a large freestanding bath. To keep the home comfortable all year round the property has 2 Split system heating/cooling units, ceiling fans and double glazed windows.
Other features include:- Double garage with internal and rear access, stainless kick boards, ample storage and cupboard space throughout, exposed aggregate driveway, gated access to the rear yard, water tank and outdoor shower with hot / cold running water.
Inspection will impress, contact us today to arrange a time to view this beautifully presented home.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

LOOK NO FURTHER
Located in a quiet court this neat as a pin, classic holiday home is waiting for your enjoyment.
It features 3 bedrooms, the master with semi en-suite bathroom, generous open plan living area with split system heating/cooling and full length covered veranda to laze away the afternoon.
With big low maintenance fully fenced yard there is plenty of room for boats, caravans or backyard cricket along with large powered double garage and has the bonus of being fully furnished as an inclusion.
Inspection a must.

INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
Located within the beautiful Ramada Resort on pristine Phillip Island, just 1.5 hours drive from Melbourne, this fully furnished villa will appeal to corporate couples, singles or families looking for a luxurious, relaxing, maintenance free getaway.
The villa features 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom, with a bright and sunny open plan living, dining and kitchen area and an amazing deck overlooking the lovely rural landscape. Additional features includes a dishwasher, washer and dryer. The villa is in a secluded, private area of the resort that is located within 100 meters of the resorts facilities, including a cafe/bar, indoor gym, games room and walking trails full of wildlife. At this price you can’t go wrong!

RESORT STYLE LIVING OVERLOOKING THE GOLF COURSE
Welcome to Fairway Views, the ultimate address for relaxed resort style living.
With stage 2 currently under construction, now is the time to save on stamp duty and secure a contemporary style townhouse overlooking the first and ninth holes of the Phillip Island Golf Course.
With 4 spacious townhouses on offer, there is a choice of three or four bedroom floorplans, all with 2.5 bathrooms, generous living areas, well-appointed stylish kitchen, alfresco dining area, double garage and fully landscaped gardens. All townhouses have been designed for luxurious, low maintenance living.
As part of this secure gated complex, residence have access to the swimming pool, tennis court, BBQ hub with full outdoor kitchen and golf putting green.
Located directly opposite Phillip Island golf club and only a short walk to magnificent north facing sandy beaches, this property would make an ideal permanent residence or investment opportunity!
Picture yourself here and make the move to start living your dream lifestyle!
*Note* Internal Photos are for display purposes only

ON THE FRONT ROW WITH GREAT VIEWS
Located on the front row opposite the beach with beautiful views of the bay this central contemporary house sized apartment is suitable for either permanent living or continue on with the lucrative holiday rental it currently achieves.
Featuring 3 generous bedrooms, the master with walk through robe and en suite.Easy living is taken care of with a large open plan lounge/dining and quality kitchen opening onto the covered deck that over looks the park and the bay.
Add to this a second bathroom, full laundry and 2 secure basement car parks with storage shed accessed via the elevator and the added bonus of being fully furnished.
With a cafe also on site and only meters walk to the main street this one is not to be missed.Inspection a must!

A unique foreshore property
Location, Location, Location is the old saying with savvy real estate investors, well here is a beautiful foreshore property that offers all ingredients of a great investment. This property is in a wonderful location offering fantastic water views, a short walk to Cowes shopping precinct and backs onto a beautiful sandy safe beach. If you are into boating it is also only minutes to the Cowes launching ramp. The home offers 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, open plan and being North facing has fabulous decked areas to enjoy the views and ambience of the property. There is plenty of parking and a beautiful garden, there is in the garden the most beautiful Oak tree which is renowned on the island as one of the special trees. These sorts of properties are tightly held on Phillip Island and come available rarely, at under the $1M mark this offers remarkable value and we would expect this property to be sold very quickly. The property is offered by private inspection, if you are after something very special you will not be disappointed. Please call Peter Buitenhuis on 0407 045525 to arrange a viewing time.

Great Investment or Holiday Home
This brand new house is light and bright and will make the perfect investment, or an ideal holiday home.
Seamlessly designed over two levels this home has room to accommodate for the whole family or MORE! Featuring 3 spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, 2 spacious living areas, 2 bathrooms (master with two way ensuite and walk in robe), separate laundry and toilet downstairs. Outside has been beautifully landscaped for low maintenance living and plenty of room for your animals or kids to run around. Additionally there is plenty of room for parking in the carport with rear access to the yard.
Upstairs boasts a light filled open plan living and dining with beautiful high ceilings and a picturesque outlook overlooking the Shoalhaven Lake. This home is fully equipped with two split systems, dishwasher and stainless steel appliances. Directly across the road is a path which will lead you straight to walking tracks around the lake. This house is situated within walking distance to the well renowned Red Rocks Beach and the Cowes North facing foreshore beaches.
This home ticks all the boxes, book an inspection ASAP!

WALK TO THE BEACH and TOWN CENTRE
This is a great opportunity to purchase a brick unit with a great tenant paying $180.00 per week and located in the heart of Cowes the property has been maintained in great condition, offering 2 large bedrooms – Large open plan living, galley kitchen central to the living area with off street parking.

ORIGINAL ISLAND HOME
First time offered in half a century, a true piece of history.
This home has been designed and built with quality craftsmanship rarely seen these days.
Constructed when Phillip Island was truly an island escape, with the only access via the local barge.
Built to last this very affordable home is in great condition and an ideal canvas to design your permanent or holiday home.
Offering open plan living, kitchen and dining plus a 2nd living overlook the rear north facing yard.
Additional features include 3 large bedrooms, renovated bathroom, single car garage with rear access great for storing your boat or trailer.
Set on approximately 600m2 close to lakes, parks, bike tracks and only a short walk to Cowes beach and or Shops
Call now to arrange your inspection.

Why build when you can buy brand new?
This superb, newly completed 4 bedroom home is located in the stunning Seagrove Estate, close to parkland and playgrounds and a short stroll to Cowes North facing beaches and shopping centre.
Featuring bamboo floating floors throughout, the home comprises of 4 bedroom’s (master with walk in robe and ensuite),a light filled open plan living area featuring a central gas fired wood heater with sliding door access onto an East facing deck, ideal for entertaining, kitchen featuring stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, island bench and large pantry cupboard, a second bathroom with bath and separate shower and spacious laundry. Other features include a large double garage with remote access, solar/gas hot water system, ceiling fan in the living room and a fully fenced yard. This property would make an ideal family home or holiday escape. Inspection is sure to impress.

FULLY FURNISHED TOWNHOUSE IN CENTRAL COWES
Fantastic investment opportunity, this fully furnished townhouse is perfectly located only a short stroll from the Cowes foreshore beach and the main shopping and restaurant strip.
Located at the front of a small development, the townhouse offers 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and open plan kitchen, living and dining area that extends out onto a spacious north facing deck. The layout of the lower level is ideal for the family, with two spacious bedrooms surrounding a central bathroom. The upper level offers a large master bedroom with en-suite, modern kitchen and generous dining and lounge zone with a lovely northern aspect. The upper level deck is perfect for morning coffee or evening entertaining.
The property includes a double garage attached to the townhouse and a spacious fully fenced lawn courtyard, ideal for children and pets or privacy to enjoy the summer sunshine.
This property is offered fully furnished making it the ideal holiday house or investment opportunity. Make it your next investment, arrange your private inspection today.

JUST LIKE NEW AND BUILDERS OWN!
Perfect location for a family home, inside the popular and well established Shearwater Estate. Here is your chance to have a near new home across the street from the park full of children's equipment, a BBQ area, and a footy oval. This quality built brick home has unique features to set it apart from all the other homes you have been looking at. It features a reverse cycle split system, racked ceilings, and modern practical floor plan. The open kitchen and dining area has stone bench tops, splash back and plenty of cupboard space. Both bedrooms have built in robes and beautiful central bathroom and separate toilet. The master bedroom has it's own his and hers walk in robe and en-suite that is fit for The Block. The back yard offers a wide timber deck and timber seating, A great place to sit back relax and enjoy the company of good friends. This near new home is sure to meet all your expectations…

Set in a most select location!
Centrally located in the heart of Cowes and only a short, flat stroll to all amenities is this modern single level family home built by local builders Beach House Constructions.
The residence comprises two spacious living areas, three generous sized robed bedrooms and two bathrooms. The master is complete with a walk in robe and full ensuite.
The main open plan living, kitchen and dining area has a chicory style pitched roof and allows access through bi-fold doors to the lovely North facing partially undercover outdoor alfresco area which overlooks the impressive landscaped surrounds.
Offering a host of additional features that includes polished timber floors, split system heating and cooling, an open fire place along with combustion heating, glass splash back and stainless steel appliances to the kitchen and a double garage with direct access to the home
Set within a 397 sqm approx fenced allotment this home is ideal for retirees, holidaymakers and investors alike
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

First Home, Holiday Escape!
Offering the ideal introduction to Cowes' relaxed beachside lifestyle, this single level three-bedroom home is located in a quiet street within walking distance to the north facing bay beach and Cowes shopping precinct. Set on a 617sqm approx allotment with a wonderful entrance highlighted by palms giving a warm tropical feel making this home perfect for holiday or permanent living.
As you walk in the front door you are greeted with timber lined cathedral ceilings to the open plan living, kichen and dining, offering you a wonderful sense of openness. The hallway leads to three good size bedrooms, all with built in robes, family bathroom including bath and separate shower and laundry.
Additional features include a lovely undercover balcony at the front of the home, combustion heating, electric cooking, double garage with power and garden shed.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

FAMILY ENTERTAINER TO SUIT ALL BUYERS
A family sized home that won't break the budget is ready for you to move in.
Positioned on a large low maintenance block with side access, the home features 3 generous bedrooms, 2 bathrooms including en-suite, 2 open living areas and a sunny entertaining deck.
Located in the award winning Seagrove Estate, this property is close to the park and lake and within walking distance to the main street and foreshore beach. Inspection a must.

PRICED TO SELL
This is a great opportunity to develop this 2373m2 site. Plans and permits have been approved for fourteen town houses. Situated in an excellent location close to all that Cowes has to offer and ready to go this is an investment opportunity not to be missed!

PRIME POSITION
Situated at the rear of the four unit development in the centre of Cowes, this unit features north facing living with a spacious courtyard. If you are looking for the heart of Cowes and a short stroll to the beach you have found it! Walk to restaurants & shops no need to drive! Secure garage with direct access to the lounge! Three bedrooms with BIR's, Full family bathroom with shower and bath and separate toilet. The spacious kitchen features stainless steel appliances and generous storage. European laundry with integrated linen press.
This is an excellent investment opportunity.

BEACHSIDE RETREAT
This immaculately kept house is located in Central Cowes, a stone throw from the beach and will tick all of your boxes!
Featuring 3 large bedrooms with built in robes, master with ensuite and walk in robe. A large open plan kitchen, living and dining. One space garage with rear access to a lovely sunny low maintenance courtyard. This home is the perfect beach retreat for the family weekend getaway, or a great investment for holiday or permanent rental. If its permanent low maintenance living you’re after pack your bags and move right in.
Located in an ideal position in central Cowes, close to the beautiful north facing foreshore beach, local primary school, restaurants and amenities – what more could you want!
Book an inspection today

SEAGROVE ESTATE
The Sandpiper release features an unbeatable location close to the beach and main street.
Home sites in the Sandpiper release feature an underground gas (LPG) network, recycled water, and are part of the National Broadband Network.
The Sandpiper release is currently under construction, with titles anticipated in May.
